name: Thomas Carlyle
what_did:
Thomas Carlyle wrote powerful books about history, heroes, and how people shape the world.
He believed that strong leaders and clear thinking were very important.
He also gave famous speeches and helped people care more about the past.
why_matters:
Carlyle changed how people thought about history and leadership.
He helped show that great people can change the world.
His books made many readers think harder about truth and duty.

questions.q: Why do people still read Carlyle?
options: He helped people think about the past and great people

questions.q: What kind of books did he write?

fun_fact: Carlyle once gave a big speech about heroes that inspired people all across England!
